front.title: IEEE Guide for Application of Expulsion Fuses in Enclosures (Supplement to C37.48-1987)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Superseded by C37.48-1997 As a supplement to the IEEE guide for application of expulsion fuses in enclosures, guidelines are provided for the application and maintenance of liquid-submerged and in-air expulsion fuses in enclosures. The operation of liquid-submerged fuses is also covered.
